name: 4craft-website
description: This is the source code for the [4craft website](https://4craft.net), which is the website for the 4craft Minecraft server. 4craft is a multiplayer paper Minecraft server for both Bedrock and Java versions of Minecraft. Anybody is free to make any code changes to this website and submit a pull request. Doing this will be covered in the next section.
author: WowMuchDoge
